channel.title: EIGRPv6 on Welcome to the World of Tomorrow
channel.description: Recent content in EIGRPv6 on Welcome to the World of Tomorrow

item.title: Route Redistribution OSPFv3 and EIGRPv6
item.description: Introduction Hello and thank you for checking out this post. I was recently working through OSPF and EIGRP for ENARSI studies and something came up on a lab I was building. Redistributing routes between OSPFv3 and EIGRPv6. I am specifically speaking of the IPv6 variant of these protocols. In the topology you see below. We have three routing devices. One running only EIGRPv6, one running OSPFv3 (Aruba CX), and the redistribution node running both protocols.
